mapper.select: SELECT tsa.ID, tsa.ATTR_ID, tsa.SPU_CODE, tsa.SORT_ORDER, ta.ATTR_NAME, ta.ATTR_CODE, ta.ATTR_INPUT_TYPE, ta.ATTR_TYPE, ta.ATTR_VALUES, ta.ATTR_INDEX, ta.IS_LINKED FROM TR_SPU_ATTR tsa LEFT JOIN TT_ATTR ta ON ta.ATTR_ID = tsa.ATTR_ID WHERE tsa.SPU_CODE = #{spuCode} ORDER by tsa.SORT_ORDER
